item.title: Apple is under pressure to deliver a hit iPhone

item.title: In West Virginia, Medicaid is a lifeline. GOP cuts could devastate the state.
item.description: GOP states are particularly reliant on a program that President Donald Trump and other Republicans have targeted for deep spending reductions.

item.title: How Israel deceived the United States about its nuclear weapons program
item.description: Israel is attacking Iran’s nuclear sites, but Tehran’s secret path was blazed by the Israelis.

item.title: Supreme Court takes case of Rastafarian whose head was shaved by prison guards
item.description: The Supreme Court announced it will take up the case of a devout Rastafarian whose dreadlocks were forcibly shaved by Louisiana prison guards.

item.title: Trump is under water on some of his top issues — including immigration, poll shows
item.description: The president’s approval rating had been ticking upward since its biggest drop in April.

item.title: Trump’s chaotic economy is causing headaches for Democrats in New Jersey's governor race
item.description: The crowded contest in the Garden State shows how hard it is to address pocketbook issues.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
